original_text: And I wept much, because no man was found worthy to open and to read the book, neither to look thereon.
korean_text: 그 두루마리를 펴거나 보거나 하기에 합당한 자가 보이지 아니하기로 내가 크게 울었더니

sentences.original_text: because no man was found worthy
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아무도 합당한 자를 찾지 못하였음이라

sentences.original_text: to open and to read the book
